name: LendingPoolLiquidationManager
description: LendingPoolLiquidationManager contract - mplements the liquidation function. - This contract was cloned from Populous and modified to work with the Populous World eco-system.*.

eventDecorators.name: LiquidationCall
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

eventDecorators.name: OriginationFeeLiquidated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

functionDecorators.name: liquidationCall
functionDecorators.description: users can invoke this function to liquidate an undercollateralized position.

parameterDecorators.name: _reserve
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the principal reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: _purchaseAmount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of principal that the liquidator wants to repay.

parameterDecorators.name: _receivePToken
parameterDecorators.description: true if the liquidators wants to receive the PTokens, false if he wants to receive the underlying asset directly*.
